title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate Telco Transformation: AT&T's AI-Powered Migration at Scale (IND201)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 加速电信转型：AT&T 的 AI 驱动大规模迁移 (IND201)
abstract: Join this session to explore how telecommunications companies are implementing AWS generative AI services, including AWS Transform and Amazon Bedrock, to automate legacy system migrations. Learn how CSPs are modernizing Mainframe systems and VMware environments using AI-powered assessment tools, automated infrastructure-as-code generation, and intelligent legacy code transformation. AT&T will present their strategic vision and implementation approach for AI-powered Mainframe modernization.
abstract_cn: 参加本次会议，探索电信公司如何实施 AWS 生成式 AI 服务，包括 AWS Transform 和 Amazon Bedrock，以自动化传统系统迁移。了解通信服务提供商如何使用 AI 驱动的评估工具、自动化基础设施即代码生成和智能传统代码转换来现代化大型机系统和 VMware 环境。AT&T 将展示其 AI 驱动的大型机现代化战略愿景和实施方法。
